p: A GC‐MS instrument (5973N; Agilent Technologies, Wilmington, DE, USA) equipped with a mass selective detector operating in the electron impact mode (70 eV) was used to study the compositions of the lemon verbena essential oil according to Hashemi, Khaneghah, Tavakolpour, Asnaashari, and Mehr ( 2015). For each compound on the chromatogram, the percentage of peak area relative to the total peak areas from all compounds was determined and reported as relative amount of that compound.
